text: pitabrakd nasa k rou n ku sthet knong krom robsa mousaea te ke ban romlophbampean leu puok teangnoh . haey yeung ban bratan aoy ke nouv kamnbtropy muoychamnuon del kaunsao r robsa vea pitchea thngon knong kar li champoh puok borsa del mean kamleang khlangokla khn del krom robsa ke ban niyeay towkean ke tha chaur anak kom sabbay huosaheto( rmilkoun) pitabrakd nasa a l laoh min sraleanh puok del sabbay huosaheto laey
